channel.title: HellRelm Show off
channel.description:
This is my Private server that I'm hoping to launch whenever I feel it has been finished. Its only about 50% complete as of right now, and I still need to fix a lot ofbugs and add a lot more details. My focus was on every small detail of what I think a pking server should have.
My title screen on the client: [IMG]http://i151.photobucket.com/albums/s149/jnm324/Titlescreen.jpg[/img]
My Starting, Safe/home area (map of pking area included): [IMG]http://i151.photobucket.com/albums/s149/jnm324/mainhall.jpg[/img]
My market place: [IMG]http://i151.photobucket.com/albums/s149/jnm324/Mktplc.jpg[/img]
Special Skilling areas(most skills are incorporated in the game and dont have a special area): [IMG]http://i151.photobucket.com/albums/s149/jnm324/Farming.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i151.photobucket.com/albums/s149/jnm324/Wcarea.jpg[/img]
Map of area/Boundaries of HellRelm: [IMG]http://i151.photobucket.com/albums/s149/jnm324/map.jpg[/img]
Portal-based teleport system(no spell teleports, fair pking) Full Runecrafting 99% Woodcutting Full Farming Full Theiving Fully Herblore with a few homemade add-on potions/chemicals Fully Prayer Full Fletching Full Crafting Smithing skill makes Dragon items only. Full Cooking 75% Fishing Agility skill 95% Firemaking In-Game Skill guide books, no more click on the skill menus 16 Stores Two functioning original minigames My own combat EXP calculator Custom skillcape emotes
Updates soon to come: Create the following skill areas: mining, slayer, and fishing. Create these new areas: Monster Madness minigame area, 2nd Marketplace(only a consideration at this point). Finish/make all partial/not made skills. Perfect all skills used in-game. Perfect PVP combat. Creating a way to punish anyone who escapes my boundaries(kill them lol) Make 5 new quests and make an achievement system based on skills, pk points, money and such. Create my Custom items earned by buying, achieving, and doing quests. Possibly add new items that can be made by skills(potions ect.)
Any suggestions? Its a lot more detailed than it may look, youll have to play to find out

item.description:
@djmeadows88 wrote:

Not going to flame and all because of course you did try, which alot do not do, but the Background for the loading screen is a mess, you had to of resized it and made it bigger, because its not the greatest looking. But other than that server looks great A+ for effort bruhh

But anyway…

item.title: HellRelm Show off
item.dc:creator: @RunesGAYpe RunesGAYpe
item.description:
@RunesGAYpe wrote:

This is my Private server that I’m hoping to launch whenever I feel it has been finished. Its only about 50% complete as of right now, and I still need to fix a lot ofbugs and add a lot more details. My focus was on every small detail of what I think a pking server should have.

My title screen on the client:

Titlescreen.jpg773×553

My Starting, Safe/home area (map of pking area included):

mainhall.jpg773×553

My market place:

Mktplc.jpg773×553

Special Skilling areas(most skills are incorporated in the game and dont have a special area):

Farming.jpg773×553

Wcarea.jpg773×553

Map of area/Boundaries of HellRelm:

map.jpg865×545

Portal-based teleport system(no spell teleports, fair pking)
Full Runecrafting
99% Woodcutting
Full Farming
Full Theiving
Fully Herblore with a few homemade add-on potions/chemicals
Fully Prayer
Full Fletching
Full Crafting
Smithing skill makes Dragon items only.
Full Cooking
75% Fishing
Agility skill
95% Firemaking
In-Game Skill guide books, no more click on the skill menus
16 Stores
Two functioning original minigames
My own combat EXP calculator
Custom skillcape emotes

Updates soon to come:
Create the following skill areas: mining, slayer, and fishing.
Create these new areas: Monster Madness minigame area, 2nd Marketplace(only a consideration at this point).
Finish/make all partial/not made skills.
Perfect all skills used in-game.
Perfect PVP combat.
Creating a way to punish anyone who escapes my boundaries(kill them lol)
Make 5 new quests and make an achievement system based on skills, pk points, money and such.
Create my Custom items earned by buying, achieving, and doing quests.
Possibly add new items that can be made by skills(potions ect.)

Any suggestions? Its a lot more detailed than it may look, youll have to play to find out

Read full topic
